CustomField.description: When selected, excludes the assignment from Work Planners and from the Resource and Project Planners. Any excluded assignments are omitted from totals calculations in all planners and from color coding in the Resource and Project Planners.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When selected, excludes the assignment from the Resource and Project Planners. Any excluded assignments are not included in totals calculations and color coding in Planners.
CustomField.label: Exclude from Planners
